title: A collection of {chef} criterion functions
text: {chefCriteria} package aims provide library inclusion criteria functions use AMNOG analyses created {chef} package. functions found {chefCriteria} designed used {chef}, may unwieldy use functions independently.

title: A collection of {chef} criterion functions
text: Please refer guidelines described ecosystem wrapper package {ramnog} developer documentation.

what: Evaluate inclusion criterion for by-strata-by-treatment statistics based on the number of subjects with events in the total population. — crit_bb_nsubev_01
title: Evaluate inclusion criterion for by-strata-by-treatment statistics based on the number of subjects with events in the total population. — crit_bb_nsubev_01
text: function checks number subjects events total population greater equal specified minimum.

title: Evaluate inclusion criterion for by-strata-by-treatment statistics based on the number of subjects with events in the total population. — crit_bb_nsubev_01
Evaluate inclusion criterion for by-strata-by-treatment statistics based on the number of subjects with events in the total population. — crit_bb_nsubev_01
text: dat data.table. analysis data set. event_index vector integers index rows dat match definition 'event'. Matching done via INDEX_ column dat. subjectid_var character. Name subject identifier variable dat (default "USUBJID"). n_subj_event_min minimum number subjects events required total population. ... Additional arguments passed function.

title: Evaluate inclusion criterion for by-strata-by-treatment statistics based on the number of subjects with events in the total population. — crit_bb_nsubev_01
text: Boolean value indicating whether criterion met.

what: Evaluate inclusion criterion for by-strata-by-treatment statistics based on the p-value in the total population. — crit_bb_pval_01
title: Evaluate inclusion criterion for by-strata-by-treatment statistics based on the p-value in the total population. — crit_bb_pval_01
text: function checks p-value total population specified maximum.

title: Evaluate inclusion criterion for by-strata-by-treatment statistics based on the p-value in the total population. — crit_bb_pval_01
code: crit_bb_pval_01(   dat,   event_index,   cell_index,   treatment_var,   treatment_refval,   subjectid_var,   pval_max,   ... )

title: Evaluate inclusion criterion for by-strata-by-treatment statistics based on the p-value in the total population. — crit_bb_pval_01
text: dat data.table. analysis data set. event_index vector integers index rows dat match definition 'event'. Matching done via INDEX_ column dat. cell_index vector integers referencing rows dat (specified INDEX_ column dat) match population analyzed. See "Endpoint Events" vignette ramnog information. treatment_var character. name treatment variable dat. treatment_refval character. reference value treatment variable dat. subjectid_var character. Name subject identifier variable dat (default "USUBJID"). pval_max maximum p-value. ... Additional arguments passed function.

title: Evaluate inclusion criterion for by-strata-by-treatment statistics based on the p-value in the total population. — crit_bb_pval_01
text: Boolean value indicating whether criterion met.

what: Evaluate endpoint criterion based on number of subjects with events. — crit_ep_nsubev_01
title: Evaluate endpoint criterion based on number of subjects with events. — crit_ep_nsubev_01
text: function checks number subjects events least one study arm greater equal specified minimum.

title: Evaluate endpoint criterion based on number of subjects with events. — crit_ep_nsubev_01
code: crit_ep_nsubev_01(   dat,   event_index,   subjectid_var,   treatment_var,   n_subj_event_min,   ... )

title: Evaluate endpoint criterion based on number of subjects with events. — crit_ep_nsubev_01
text: dat data.table. analysis data set. event_index vector integers index rows dat match definition 'event'. Matching done via INDEX_ column dat. subjectid_var character. Name subject identifier variable dat (default "USUBJID"). treatment_var name variable dat containing treatment group assignments. n_subj_event_min minimum number subjects events required least one study arm. ... Additional arguments passed function.

title: Evaluate endpoint criterion based on number of subjects with events. — crit_ep_nsubev_01
text: Boolean value indicating whether criterion met.
